banner.description: Create your dream team, compete with friends, and track real-time NBA stats. Ready to play?

altText.heroHand: Hand holding mobile showing game application

GetNotified.description: We'll send you the link as soon as the app is available.
GetNotified.promoText: Early Access players in the first week unlock 2 exclusive jerseys

slides.name: Strategic Boosts
slides.content: Unlock strategic boosts to enhance your team‚ÄîLuxury Tax, 6th Man, Chef Curry, and more. Use them to gain an edge over your opponents!

slides.name: Real-time NBA Stats
slides.content: Create a private league, compete in real-time, track your victories, and see who wins!

slides.name: Daily Lineups
slides.content: Craft your perfect roster every day. Choose from the best players and maximize your fantasy points with smart picks.

slides.name: Challenge Friends
slides.content: Create a private league, compete in real-time with your friends, track your victories, and see who wins!

slides.name: Global Competition
slides.content: Compete against players worldwide! Climb the weekly and monthly leaderboards for a chance to win amazing prizes and earn bragging rights.

Experience.title: Experience the Ultimate
Experience.subtitle2: You build your starting five based on the day's games, within your budget

card1.title: Build Your 5
card1.subtitle: Your lineup changes every night
card1.content: Create a new starting five based on the NBA games of the night. Budget, stars, strategy‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs your call

card2.title: Scores & Rankings
card2.subtitle: Real NBA stats
card2.content: Your players score in real-time, based on their actual NBA performances every night. As the games unfold, your team's fantasy score updates instantly, reflecting the points, rebounds, assists, and other stats of your selected players.

PrivateLeagues.title: Private Leagues
PrivateLeagues.subtitle: Challenge your friends
PrivateLeagues.description: Create your own mini-league with friends. New lineups every night, Playoffs, strategic boosts‚Ä¶ The most fun way to play with friends

GlobalLeagues.title: Global League
GlobalLeagues.subtitle: Compete against the world
GlobalLeagues.description: Climb the global leaderboard with weekly and monthly rankings. Compete against players worldwide and watch your position rise as you score more points each night!
GlobalLeagues.badgeDescription: Compete against everyone. Weekly + Monthly prizes

GetApp.title: Get This app on
GetApp.colorTitle: Apple & Google play store after launching
GetApp.description: Everything you need to know about Mon5Majeur and how it works

FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Mon5Majeur and how it works

questions.question: What is Mon5Majeur?
questions.answer: An NBA fantasy game made to play with friends: you build your starting five every night, follow live scores, and climb the rankings.

questions.question: Is the app free?
questions.answer: Yes. The app is free, with optional premium features.

questions.question: Can I play with my friends?
questions.answer: Yes. You can create Private Leagues (mini seasons + playoffs) and join them via invitation.

questions.question: Where do the scores come from?
questions.answer: From real NBA performances, updated every night (and in real time during games).

questions.question: How do I get the 2 exclusive jerseys?
questions.answer: Sign up for the launch alert and create your account during the first week after release: the 2 in-game jerseys will be unlocked and available to claim for free in the shop.

PlayersGuide.title: Ultimate
PlayersGuide.description: A complete PDF packed with strategies, insights, and step-by-step guidance to help you make smarter decisions and level up your game.

features.title: Pre-launch Bonus
features.subtitle: 2 exclusive jerseys offered to all pre-registered players

features.title: In-game Jerseys
features.subtitle: Customize your team with exclusive jerseys.

features.title: Team Logo
features.subtitle: Create your GM identity. Your team, your style.

features.title: Hall of Fame
features.subtitle: Weekly and monthly rankings. Become one of the best

features.title: Victory Trophy
features.subtitle: Win your league and unlock your unique trophy

features.title: Strategic Bonuses
features.subtitle: +3 points, automatic substitute, budget boost... The right choices make the difference.

ContactBanner.title: CONTACT
ContactBanner.subtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us with any questions or feedback.

scope.title: Scope
scope.content:
This Privacy Policy applies to: 
the MON5MAJEUR application; and the website mon5majeur.com (and any associated site), including when a User subscribes to a launch alert / waitlist.

data_controller.title: Data Controller
data_controller.content: MON5MAJEUR, SASU with a share capital of ‚Ç¨1,000, registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register (RCS) under number 993 681 915 (SIRET: 99368191500019), with its registered office at 229 rue Saint-Honor√©, 75001 Paris, France.

data_collection.title: Data We Collect
data_collection.identity_account: Identity / account: email, user ID, username, account-related information (Google/Apple if used).
data_collection.game_data: Game data: lineups, scores, rankings, leagues, progression, Credits, preferences.
data_collection.technical_data: Technical data: device, OS, version, logs, crash reports, IP address / connection information.
data_collection.in_app_purchases: In-app purchases: identifiers/receipts required for verification/restoration (no banking data).
data_collection.advertising: Advertising: advertising identifiers (IDFA/GAID) and ad interactions, depending on your choices.
data_collection.support: Support: messages and information sent to customer support.
data_collection.website: Website (launch alert): email + technical metadata (e.g., IP/logs) required for security and proper operation.
data_collection.sensitive_data_footer: We do not knowingly collect sensitive data.

purposes.title: Purposes
purposes.content: We use your data to: provide and manage the service (account, gameplay, leagues, rankings); ensure security and prevent fraud; improve performance (bugs/crashes); manage in-app purchases; display and measure advertising; send communications (support, security, and launch alerts if you subscribe).

legal_bases.title: Legal Bases
legal_bases.contract: Performance of a contract (Terms): account, service, gameplay;
legal_bases.legitimate_interest: Legitimate interests: security, fraud prevention, technical improvements;
legal_bases.consent: Consent: personalized ads and certain identifiers/trackers where required;
legal_bases.legal_obligation: Legal obligation: accounting/tax obligations where applicable.

advertising_mediation.title: Advertising & Mediation
advertising_mediation.content: The app displays ads and uses: Google AdMob, and AppLovin MAX (mediation), which may integrate multiple ad networks. Depending on your choices (and the rules applicable in your region), certain partners may process advertising identifiers and technical signals to serve/measure ads, including personalized ads when you consent.
advertising_mediation.management_content: You can change your choices via: a consent screen (on first launch or via Settings > Privacy / Privacy options in the app, if available), and/or your device settings (iOS/Android).

recipients.title: Recipients / Processors
recipients.intro: Your data may be processed by:
list: Google AdMob, AppLovin MAX, and ad networks enabled through mediation (depending on consent);
Where applicable, technical service providers (monitoring, crash reports, analytics);

ad_partners.title: List of Advertising Partners
ad_partners.content: The list of ad networks may change depending on country/campaigns/availability. We provide an up-to-date list in the App (Settings > Privacy / Privacy options), and/or on a dedicated page: mon5majeur.com/ad-partners.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.active_account: Active account: as long as necessary to provide the service.
retention.deletion: Account deletion: deletion/anonymization within 30 days (except legal obligations/disputes).
retention.launch_alert: Launch alert (website): email kept until launch + a reasonable period after notification, or until you unsubscribe.

cookies.title: Cookies / Trackers (Website)
cookies.content: The website may use trackers for: operation (strictly necessary), audience measurement, potentially advertising (if implemented on the website). Where required, a consent banner allows you to manage your choices.

security.title: Security
security.content: Reasonable measures are implemented, including: encrypted communications (HTTPS/TLS), access controls, backups, and monitoring.

transfers.title: Security Transfers Outside the EU
transfers.content: Depending on the architecture and services used (AWS + advertising), processing may occur outside the EU/EEA. Where this happens, we implement appropriate safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses) and suitable protective measures.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction, portability, and the right to withdraw consent.
rights.exercise: To exercise your rights: contact@mon5majeur.fr (identity verification may be requested if necessary).
rights.complaint: You may also lodge a complaint with the CNIL (French data protection authority).

minors.title: Minors
minors.content: The app is accessible from age 13. For users under 15, certain consent-based processing (e.g., personalized advertising) may require parental consent.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: This Policy may be updated. In case of major changes, we will inform you via the app and/or email when relevant.

TermsAndConditions.1stContent:
The MON5MAJEUR application (hereinafter the Application) is published and operated by: MON5MAJEUR, SASU with a capital of ‚Ç¨1,000, registered with the Paris RCS under the number 993 681 915 (SIRET: 99368191500019), with its registered office located at 229 rue Saint-Honor√©, 75001 Paris, France. 
President: Robin Martinella.
Publication Director: Robin Martinella. 
Contact: support@mon5majeur.com
TermsAndConditions.2ndContent: The website is hosted by OVH SAS, 2 rue Kellermann, 59100 Roubaix, France.
TermsAndConditions.3rd:
These TCU define the terms of access and use of MON5MAJEUR. 
By accessing the Application, the User agrees to these TCU without reservation.
TermsAndConditions.4thContent:
MON5MAJEUR is a Fantasy Basketball application that allows Users to: 
Create virtual teams based on the real performance of NBA players. 
-Participate in public leagues. 
-Participate in private leagues. 
-View rankings, scores, and statistics. 
-Earn and use virtual currency (Credits).  
-Access free and paid content via in-app purchases, bonuses, and rewarded advertisements. Independence: MON5MAJEUR is not affiliated with the NBA. No NBA-protected logos or visuals are used.
TermsAndConditions.5th_1st_content:
The Application is (or will be) available for free on the App Store (iOS) and Google Play (Android) upon its launch.
The User must have a compatible device and an Internet connection (costs at their expense).
TermsAndConditions.5th_2nd_content:
The Application is accessible from 13 years old. Minors use the service with the permission and under the responsibility of their parents or guardians. 
For Users under 15, when processing is based on consent (e.g., personalized advertising), parental consent may be required.
TermsAndConditions.5th_3rd_content: Purchases are optional and processed exclusively via the App Store and Google Play. The holder of the payment method is responsible for transactions.
TermsAndConditions.5th_4th_content: Parents are encouraged to use the parental control tools available on these platforms.
TermsAndConditions.6th_1st_content: Creation via email or Google/Apple account.
TermsAndConditions.6th_2nd_content: The User providers accurate and up-to-date information.
TermsAndConditions.6th_3rd_content: The User protects their login credentials; if suspicious, they contact support.
TermsAndConditions.6th_4th_content: An inactive account for 24 months may be deleted after notification.
TermsAndConditions.6th_5th_content: Account deletion upon request via the Application or support@mon5majeur.com.
TermsAndConditions.7th_1st_content: Credits are a virtual currency specific to the game, non-transferable and non-convertible to cash.
TermsAndConditions.7th_2nd_content: Processed via Apple/Google; no banking data is stored by MON5MAJEUR.
TermsAndConditions.7th_3rd_content: Subject to the rules of the App Store and Google Play.Account deletion: Remaining Credits are lost without compensation.
TermsAndConditions.7th_4th_content: The Publisher may modify the functioning/price of Credits in a clear and fair manner.
TermsAndConditions.8thContent:
The Application may contain advertisements, sponsored videos, and partner content. 
Some rewards may require watching an advertisement (optional). 
Advertisements may be personalized based on the User‚Äôs choices and device settings.
TermsAndConditions.9thTitle: USAGE RULES AND CODE OF CONDUCT
TermsAndConditions.9th_1st_content: Bots, hacks, scripts, exploiting bugs, bypassing the system, or any action aimed at distorting the game.
TermsAndConditions.9th_2nd_content: Content must be respectful and comply with laws. The Publisher May delete/modify any inappropriate content.
TermsAndConditions.9th_4th_content: Warning, restriction, suspension, or account deletion.
TermsAndConditions.10thContent: MON5MAJEUR  may organize free contests (no purchase necessary) allowing users to win rewards (e.g., jerseys, merchandise, Credits).
TermsAndConditions.10th_1st_content: Apple App Store and Google Play do not participate in the organization/funding/validation of the contests.
TermsAndConditions.10th_2nd_content: Each contest specifies in the Application: dates, conditions, number of winners, selection method, and prize delivery details.
TermsAndConditions.10th_3rd_content: Prizes are non-exchangeable, non-refundable, and non-convertible to cash. In case of unavailability, a replacement prize of equivalent or higher value may be offered.
TermsAndConditions.10th_4th_content: Physical prizes are reserved for residents of: Metropolitan France, Belgium, Luxembourg, Monaco. Otherwise, the prize will be awarded to the next eligible participant.
TermsAndConditions.10th_5th_content: ‚ÄúJersey‚Äù prizes may come from current or past collections (previous seasons, throwback, previous editions). A jersey may correspond to a past season.
TermsAndConditions.10th_6th_content: Unless expressly stated, the choice of model (player, team, season, color, edition) is at the discretion of the Publisher. The winner cannot request a specific model. The Publisher may offer a choice from a limited selection.
TermsAndConditions.10th_7th_content: S, M, L, XL, XXL depending on availability; alternative/equivalent prize if unavailable.
TermsAndConditions.10th_8th_content: Within stock limits; replacement with an equivalent or superior prize possible.
TermsAndConditions.10th_9th_content: Cheating/bug exploitation: disqualification and possible sanctions.
TermsAndConditions.11thContent: The Publisher may suspend/delete an account in case of fraud, cheating, hacking, failure to comply with TCU, or inappropriate content.
TermsAndConditions.11th_1st_content: Data, Credits, and associated content may be lost. Appeal possible via support.
TermsAndConditions.12thContent: The Application may be temporarily interrupted (maintenance, incidents). The Publisher may modify/remove features for technical, legal, or security reasons.
TermsAndConditions.13thContent:
All elements (code, design, texts, sounds) belong to the Publisher. Personal, non-transferable usage license; any reproduction/commercial exploitation is prohibited. 
Some data may come from third-party APIs: the Publisher does not guarantee the accuracy/continuous availability.
TermsAndConditions.14thContent:
The application is provided ‚Äúas is.‚Äù 
The Publisher cannot be held responsible for network/third-party failures, indirect losses, damages related to misuse.
TermsAndConditions.15thContent: No liability in case of unpredictable/irresistible events.
TermsAndConditions.16thContent: The processing of personal data is detailed in the Privacy Policy available in the Application and on the website.
TermsAndConditions.17thContent: TCU governed by French law. Disputes: competent courts in the jurisdiction of the registered office.
